channel.title: [PI] Help adding bank all simple if possible
channel.description: I don't care how I add it. But if its a command I want it to be only able to use while bank is open. I prefer it to be a object you click and it puts it all in your bank. Or a npc that you talk to will bank all that's also nice. I'm sure if I knew one way I could figure out the rest easily...so please help me! :confused: :| :( :eek:

item.title: [PI] Help adding bank all simple if possible
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

I don’t care how I add it. But if its a command I want it to be only able to use while bank is open. I prefer it to be a object you click and it puts it all in your bank. Or a npc that you talk to will bank all that’s also nice. I’m sure if I knew one way I could figure out the rest easily…so please help me! :eek:

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Help adding bank all simple if possible
